title: Rebekah Vardy slams trolls and family feuds in resurfaced interview as she rows with Coleen Rooney

An interview from 2018 has resurfaced showing Rebekah Vardy opening up about her battle with haters and confessing how online trolls had reduced her to tears.

The feisty mother-of-five, 37, is currently in the middle of a very public spat with fellow WAG Coleen Rooney .

Coleen, 33, took to social media on Wednesday to reveal she had suspected someone had been betraying her for years and had proof that her 'former' friend Rebekah was the culprit.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

(Image: PA)

The wife of former England captain Wayne Rooney claimed Rebekah had been acting as a secret mole by selling details about her personal life to the press for years.

She revealed she found out the guilty person by using a process of elimination and blocking her other followers on her private Instagram account.

Vardy, the wife of Leicester City striker Jamie , strongly denied deliberately leaking stories and suggested her Instagram account may have been hacked.

She also made a subtle dig at Coleen for making the accusations against a 'heavily pregnant' woman.

(Image: PA)

An interview had resurfaced showing Rebekah slamming online trolls for constantly sending her hate and abuse.

Rebekah's troubled family life, former bully accusations and attitude to online trolls has come to light amid her continuing feud with Coleen.

In 2018, Becky opened up to The Sun about her troubled family life. She said: "It is what it is.

"I don’t speak to certain people any more and neither does Jamie."

(Image: Dave J Hogan/Getty Images)

In the run-up to Rebekah and Jamie's wedding in 2016 , it emerged that Jamie’s parents and grandparents reportedly disapproved of his wife, while Becky’s mother also didn't attend her daughter's big day.

Becky revealed her and her mother's broken relationship will never be fixed.

During the interview, Becky branded herself as 'opinionated' when fighting back against online trolls and suggested all women should come together to overcome it.

She said: "I’m an opinionated woman. I am not a nasty person, but if I have something to say, I will say it."

(Image: PA)

When she came out of the I’m A Celebrity! jungle in 2017 , Becky was accused of bullying camp mate Iain Lee.

The reality star said she was 'genuinely shocked' at how it had come across and blasted Iain of being "fake".

In the past, Rebekah famously branded the title WAG as "offensive" and "ridiculous" and hit back against haters who accused her of being a "gold-digger".
description: The feisty WAG is facing backlash for the Coleen Rooney spat but last year she spoke out against trolls and the ongoing feud with her mother
